parameters.label: organization-defined time period of expected inactivity or description of when to log out

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Require that users log out when {{ ac-2.5_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Inactivity logout is behavior- or policy-based and requires users to take physical action to log out when they are expecting inactivity longer than the defined period. Automatic enforcement of inactivity logout is addressed by AC-11.
